 Megatron understood it very little, probably as
> much as Blindchaos and Dominjoe would if he explained it to them. He
> must have a circuit loose in his head, he would have to get it 
checked
> by Switchblade later. That he did not relish. He pulled himself up, 
and
> stood, creaking his neck. He looked at his two soldiers, then back 
at
> the screen.
> 
> "There must be a good reason those traitors stayed around the battle
> field, we must go investigate, Dominjoe, transform." he ordered, as 
he
> himself leapt to the air, folding and shrinking into his gun mode,
> falling towards Blindchaos. <Easier to transport me this way no :)>
******

::DOMNIJOE AND BLINDCHAOS::

    Blindchaos transformed and eagerly caught his commander in his 
ankylosaur mouth. He was very gentle as he arched into the air and 
tried hard not to drool on Megatron when he captured the Decepticon.
    Domnijoe transformed and allowed both Decepticons into her cockpit 
before speeding off at her max speed. She was a black seeker with 
silver weapons.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

*****************
